note:
Assistant Professor at the Department of Information Technology and Supply Chain Management, College of Business and Economics, Boise State University (opinions mine).
Researching self-identification with information technology (especially games), teaching introductory programming classes.
PhD from University of Washington Information School.
Previously at Wizards of the Coast, Green Ronin Publishing, RealNetworks, The Game Mechanics, and others.
He; Masked; Anti-fascist; Black Lives Matter.
